column4: Na yɛ aso ma me nsɛm nyinara."
Me tɛkyerɛma rekasa wɔ m’adadaw mu."

column2: "Me nsɛm bɛka m’akoma ne tsennyɛ: Na dza m’anofamfa nyim no wɔbɛka no pefee."

column3: Na Otumfo no n’ahom na ɔmaa me nkwa."
bua me; Siesie wo nsɛm yie wɔ m’enyim
mowɔ Nyankopɔn afamu dɛ woara: Mo so awendɛtse na wɔdze yɛɛ me."

column4: Nkyii so mo nhomdo rennyɛ wo do dur."

column6: mbrato nnyi mo ho; Midzi bem
column7: nkyii so emumuyɛ bi nnyi mo mu:"

column3: Nyankopɔn hwehwɛ mansosɛm bi etsia me

column6: iyi mu na enntsen; Osiandɛ Nyankopɔn so sen dasanyi."

column2: "Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na ɔwo nye no perper? Osiandɛ ommbu ne nsɛm biara ho nkontaa."

column5: sɛ nyimpa nndwen ho mpo a."

column4: Aber a nda heii atɔ adasa do

column5: "Ama ɔaatwe nyimpa aasan efi ne ndzeyɛɛ ho
column6: Na oeeyi nkontompɔ efi nyimpa ho esuma;"

column2: "Ɔno na ɔtwe ne kra ekyir fi mona mu
column3: Na no nkwa so fi afona ano wu mu."

column2: "Wɔdze yaw so tsia no wɔ ne mpa do
column3: Na ne mbiew mu daa aperper:"
Na ne kra kyir adɔkɔdɔkɔ edziban."
ma wonnhu; Na ne mbiew a wonnhu no puepue."
ne kra twe bɛn mona no
column4: Na no nkwa so bɛn asɛɛfo no."

column5: Dɛ ɔrekyerɛ nyimpa dza ɔtsen ma no a;"

column4: Gye no fi mona no mu nkɔree mu
column7: "Ɔno no honam bɛyɛ frɔmfrɔm asen abofra dze; Ɔsan kɔ ne mberantsɛber nda mu:"

column3: na n’enyi sɔ no: Ma ɔdze ehurusi hu n’enyim: Na ɔdan dasanyi ne tsenenee ma no."

column2: "Ɔno na ɔtow ndwom wɔ nyimpa enyim
column6: Naaso ɔnnye me enndzi no wenwennwen:"

column2: "Ɔno na ɔagye me kra efi mona no mu nkɔree mu

column8: "Dɛ ɔdze ne kra bɛsan efi mona no ho
column9: Ma wɔdze nkwa kan aadan no kan."

column4: na mepɛ dɛ mubu wo bem."
